law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 357, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 449, sec. 2, effective April 13, 1992. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Conduct of proceedings before board -- Persons who may be compensated for representation.
